mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_GRADE_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_PASSWORD, M.MEMBER_TEL, M.MEMBER_SECESSION_WHETHER , (SELECT MEMBER_GRADE FROM MEMBER_GRADE MG WHERE M.MEMBER_GRADE_ID = MG.MEMBER_GRADE_ID) MEMBER_GRADE , C.COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME ,(S.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE - S.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE) SUBSCRIBE_DATE FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ASSOCIATION A on M.MEMBER_ID = A.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN COMPANY C ON A.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON M.MEMBER_ID = S.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} and (s.SUBSCRIBE_USE = 'Y' or s.SUBSCRIBE_USE is null)

SELECT C.COMPANY_NAME , pa.COMPANY_ID , pa.PROJECT_ID ,pa.MEMBER_ID ,pa.PROJECT_ROLE_ID , P.PROJECT_NAME , M.MEMBER_NAME , PR.PROJECT_ROLE , MR.MEMBER_GRADE , pr.PROJECT_ROLE as groupRole , MR.MEMBER_GRADE AS groupGrade FROM PROJECT_ATTEND PA JOIN PROJECT P on PA.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID JOIN PROJECT_ROLE PR ON PA.PROJECT_ROLE_ID = PR.PROJECT_ROLE_ID JOIN ASSOCIATION A2 on PA.MEMBER_ID = A2.MEMBER_ID and PA.COMPANY_ID = A2.COMPANY_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON A2.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN MEMBER_GRADE MR ON M.MEMBER_GRADE_ID = MR.MEMBER_GRADE_ID JOIN COMPANY C ON A2.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID
WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT C.COMPANY_NAME, O.DEPARTMENT_NAME ,M.MEMBER_NAME , MG.MEMBER_GRADE,M.MEMBER_IMAGE_FILE_ROUTE,M.SAVE_FILE_NAME,M.FILE_EXTENSION,M.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME FROM MEMBER_GRADE MG JOIN MEMBER M on MG.MEMBER_GRADE_ID = M.MEMBER_GRADE_ID JOIN ASSOCIATION A ON M.MEMBER_ID = A.MEMBER_ID JOIN COMPANY C ON A.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN ORGCHART O on A.ORGCHART_ID = O.ORGCHART_ID WHERE A.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} ORDER BY COMPANY_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD,MEMBER_TEL) VALUES (#{memberName},#{memberEmail},#{memberPassword},#{memberTel})
mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_GRADE_ID, A.MEMBER_NAME, A.MEMBER_EMAIL, A.MEMBER_PASSWORD, A.MEMBER_ID, A.MEMBER_TEL, B.MEMBER_GRADE, C.COMPANY_NAME, A.SAVE_FILE_NAME, A.MEMBER_IMAGE_FILE_ROUTE, A.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, A.FILE_EXTENSION, C.COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_CEO FROM MEMBER A JOIN MEMBER_GRADE B ON A.MEMBER_GRADE_ID=B.MEMBER_GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN ASSOCIATION A2 on A.MEMBER_ID = A2.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN COMPANY C ON A2.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORGCHART.*, LEVEL AS LVL FROM ORGCHART START WITH COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND SENIOR_DEPARTMENT_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGCHART_ID = SENIOR_DEPARTMENT_ID ) WHERE DEPARTMENT_REMOVE_WHETHER IS NULL ORDER BY LVL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT O.*, LEVEL AS LVL, M.MEMBER_NAME,C.COMPANY_NAME,MG.MEMBER_GRADE,M.MEMBER_IMAGE_FILE_ROUTE FROM ORGCHART O LEFT JOIN ASSOCIATION A2 ON O.ORGCHART_ID = A2.ORGCHART_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER M on A2.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN COMPANY C ON A2.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER_GRADE MG on M.MEMBER_GRADE_ID = MG.MEMBER_GRADE_ID WHERE O.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} START WITH O.ORGCHART_ID = #{orgchartId} CONNECT BY PRIOR O.ORGCHART_ID = SENIOR_DEPARTMENT_ID ) WHERE LVL >= 1 AND DEPARTMENT_REMOVE_WHETHER IS NULL ORDER BY LVL

choose.when: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER JOIN ASSOCIATION A2 on MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = A2.MEMBER_ID JOIN COMPANY C ON A2.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID WHERE C.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_GRADE_ID != 1
